segments.text: Are you really dating with Frank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . But in my heart of hearts , I find he ’ s not very much to my liking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then why not keep away from him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is that I just have no one to turn to right now .
segments.speaker: S2
